ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: Gartner note on WOA (Web-Oriented Architecture) just published
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the quick reply. I asked the question because, to date, my understanding of the phrase centered around data (both stored and passed via messages).
